Name: ChLabBloodGroupAntibodyScreen
Title: CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Antibody Screen Test (LOINC codes)
Descriptino: This value set is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile. It represents atypical IgG antibodies prior to transfusion or during pregnancy. The screening test is designed specifically to detect IgG antibodies and some IgM antibodies (non ABO) may also be detected. Antibodies detected by the antibody screen should then be identified, and a titer performed if the antibody identified is considered to be clinically significant during pregnancy.

Name: ChLabBloodGroupAntibody
Title: CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Antibody Result (SNOMED CT coded substances)
Descriptino: This value set is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile. It contains results of Blood Group Antibodies (substance) coded with SNOMED CT. It is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile

Name: ChLabBloodGroupImmunoHematology
Title: CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Immunohematology Tests (SNOMED CT coded procedures)
Descriptino: This value set is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile. It contains Laboratory tests related to immunohematology

Name: ObservationCode_CDK_EPI_2009
Title: CH LAB-Report Codes for eGFR in CKD-EPI
Descriptino: ValueSet for the allowed eGFRcr and eGFRcr-cys codes among non-blacks

Name: ObservationCode_CDK_EPI_2021
Title: CH LAB-Report Codes for eGFR in CKD-EPI 2021
Descriptino: ValueSet for the allowed eGFRcr and eGFRcr-cys codes, has no race term

Name: ObservationCodeEntvolRatio
Title: CH LAB-Report Codes for Erythrocyte Distribuiton Width Test
Descriptino: ValueSet for the allowed codes ENTVOL and RATIO

Name: ObservationCodeMDRD
Title: CH LAB-Report Codes for eGFR (MDRD)
Descriptino: ValueSet for the allowed eGFR among males and eGFR among females codes

Name: LaboratoryResultStandardEuVs
Title: Laboratory Code
Descriptino: Laboratory observation codes. List of Laboratory observation codes derived from the LOINC and NPU code systems.

Name: LabOrderCodesEuVs
Title: Laboratory Order
Descriptino: List of LOINC Laboratory codes of type 'Order' or 'Both. This value set is built upon the IPS value set 'Results Laboratory Observation - IPS'

Name: LabReportTypesEuVs
Title: Laboratory Report Types
Descriptino: Laboratory Report Types. This version includes only one code as suggested by the eHN guideline. Category can be used for filtering per study type or specialty.

Name: LabSpecialtyEuVs
Title: Laboratory Specialty
Descriptino: Laboratory Specialties. Notes: Note 1: This value set is based on analysis of national coding practices in 8 European countries (AT, CZ, DE, FR, IE, IT, PT, SE) and agreed by involved lab experts as a common lab specialty value set. Note 2: Many European countries are using additional laboratory specialty types, which should be mapped towards this value set. Note 3: In case of documented need, this value set could be extended.

Name: LabSpecimenAdditiveEu
Title: Specimen Additive
Descriptino: List of the specimen additives. Additives are commonly added to the vacutainer tubes to preserve the specimen for laboratory analysis

Name: LabSpecimenContainerEu
Title: Specimen Container
Descriptino: List of the containers commonly used to collect specimens (e.g. urine, blood,..).

Name: LabSpecimenTypesEuVs
Title: Specimen Types
Descriptino: Laboratory Specimen Types

Name: LabStudyTypesEuVs
Title: Laboratory Study Types
Descriptino: Laboratory Study Types Notes: Note 1:26436-6 (Laboratory studies) enables issuing a report putting together observations from multiple specialties (disciplines) in the same text block, allowing delivery of a global interpretation comment at the end of the text block that will be rendered at the end of the report. Note 2:Mycology and parasitology, as well as bacteriology, are part of the 18725-2 (Microbiology studies (set)) studies. Note 3:Virology MAY be included in 18725-2 (MICROBIOLOGY STUDIES) or 18727-8 (SEROLOGY STUDIES) or split between both study types, depending upon the Content Creator Actorâ€™s choice.

Name: LabTechniqueEuVs
Title: Laboratory Techniques
Descriptino: Laboratory technique (method of measurement) used for the result measurement (based on SNOMED CT).

Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: ResultsBloodGroupSnomedCtIpsFreeSet
Title: Results Blood Group - SNOMED CT IPS Free Set
Descriptino: This value set includes the codes for blood group findings from the SNOMED International Patient Set (IPS) subset of SNOMED CT (IPS Free Set).

Name: ResultsCodedValuesLaboratoryUvIps
Title: Results Coded Values Laboratory - IPS
Descriptino: This value set is defined as the union of: (a) Blood group [Type]; (b) Presence/Absence Indicators (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.52) (c) Microorganisms (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.49)

Name: ResultsMicroorganismSnomedCtIpsFreeSet
Title: Results Microorganism - SNOMED CT IPS Free Set
Descriptino: This value set includes the codes for microorganisms from the SNOMED International Patient Set (IPS) subset of SNOMED CT (IPS Free Set).

Name: ResultsPresenceAbsenceSnomedCtIpsFreeSet
Title: Results Presence Absence - SNOMED CT IPS Free Set
Descriptino: This value set includes the codes for presence and absence findings (qualifier values) from the SNOMED International Patient Set (IPS) subset of SNOMED CT (IPS Free Set).
